requirements.summary: Replace the homepage Programme Overview content with the cleaned, day-wise DAY 1–DAY 3 schedule (May 1–3, 2026) with correct themes, labels, and time-slot/activity pairings.
acceptanceCriteria: The Programme Overview section renders three day cards (DAY 1, DAY 2, DAY 3).

DAY 1 shows theme 'Arrival & Ice-Breaking' and timings/activities: 10:00 AM – 3:00 PM Arrival; 3:00 PM – 4:00 PM Registration and Introduction; 4:00 PM – 4:25 PM Tea Break; 4:30 PM – 7:00 PM Ice-Breaking Activities; 7:30 PM – 8:15 PM Dinner.

DAY 2 shows theme 'Hands-on Workshops on Robotics & AI' and timings/activities: 8:00 AM – 9:00 AM Breakfast; 9:00 AM – 11:30 AM Opening Ceremony; 11:30 AM – 12:00 PM Tea Break; 12:00 PM – 1:00 PM Session 1st; 1:30 PM – 2:30 PM Lunch; 2:40 PM – 4:15 PM Session 2nd; 4:15 PM – 4:45 PM Tea Break; 4:45 PM – 6:00 PM Robotics & AI Workshops; 7:30 PM Onwards Principal’s Dinner + Quiz Hunt.

DAY 3 shows theme 'Design, Develop, Deliver' and timings/activities: 8:00 AM – 9:00 AM Breakfast; 9:15 AM – 11:30 AM ‘Design, Develop, Deliver’ Session; 11:30 AM – 12:00 PM Tea Break; 12:00 PM – 1:00 PM ‘Design, Develop, Deliver’ Continues; 1:15 PM – 2:15 PM Lunch; 2:30 PM – 3:30 PM Presentation Setup; 3:45 PM – 5:30 PM Judgement of Presentations; 5:30 PM – 6:00 PM High Tea; 6:30 PM Onwards Prize Distribution & Closing Ceremony.
No unrelated content (e.g., duplicated 'Principal’s Dinner' entries, incorrect weekday labels, or incorrect pairings like 'Quiz Hunt' in the wrong time slot) appears in the schedule.

file_operations.description: Update the in-component `days` data to exactly match the cleaned Programme Overview for DAY 1–DAY 3 (May 1–3, 2026): correct date/weekday labels, themes/titles, and each required time-slot-to-activity pairing; remove any incorrect/duplicated items currently present.

requirements.summary: Ensure the updated Programme Overview is what renders on the live homepage after deployment (no manual post-deploy steps).
acceptanceCriteria: After deployment, visiting the homepage shows the updated Programme Overview content from REQ-1 without requiring any manual steps.

file_operations.description: Confirm the homepage render path continues to include `ProgrammeSection` in the main page flow (not behind any conditional rendering) so that deploying the frontend build automatically publishes the updated schedule.
